Crimes.Crime_Name: Misrepresentation under Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Was the IAD's decision that Mr. Baro failed to disclose material facts reasonable?
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Mr. Baro's omission affected credibility regarding marital history
Crimes.Evidence_Type: Marital status disclosure, application forms, testimony from second wife
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Failure to disclose first marriage during 'marriage check'
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Duty to disclose material facts when specifically asked
Crimes.Proceeding_Type: Administrative appeal followed by judicial review
Crimes.Application_Error: Omission of prior marriage and court order declaring first wife deceased
Crimes.Legal_Standard: Withholding material facts under IRPA s. 40(1)(a)
Crimes.Application_Factor: Request for 'marriage check' triggered duty of full disclosure
Crimes.Outcome_of_Review: No question of general importance certified; application dismissed
Crimes.Credibility_Issues: Failure to disclose material fact undermined credibility
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Challenge to reasonableness of IAD decision
